titleStmt.title: A golden bell, and a pomgranate A sermon preached, at the visitation in Canterbury. 7. of Aprill. 1624. By Mr. Alexander Vdny, Bachelor in Diuinitie, chaplaine to his Maiestie in ordinary, and minister of Hauking in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Udny, Alexander, minister of Hauking in Kent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] and I[ohn] N[orton] for Anthony Vphill, and are to be sold at the signe of the white Lyon, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
